verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Send <S%H7971><s%> out for yourself men <S%H376><s%> so that they may spy <S%H8446><s%> out the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am going to give <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> you shall send <S%H7971><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> from each <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> of their fathers' tribes, <S%H4294><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H3605><s%> a leader <S%H5387><s%> among them."

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran <S%H6290><s%> at the command <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them men <S%H376><s%> who were heads <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> then [were] their names: <S%H8034><s%> from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Shammua <S%H8051><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccur; <S%H2139><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hori; <S%H2752><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh; <S%H3312><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Igal <S%H3008><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph; <S%H3130><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> Hoshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun; <S%H5126><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Palti <S%H6406><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Raphu; <S%H7505><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> Gaddiel <S%H1427><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Sodi; <S%H5476><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Gaddi <S%H1426><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Susi; <S%H5485><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> Ammiel <S%H5988><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gemalli; <S%H1582><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> Sethur <S%H5639><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael; <S%H4317><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Nahbi <S%H5147><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Vophsi; <S%H2058><s%>
from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> Geuel <S%H1345><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machi. <S%H4352><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy <S%H8446><s%> out the land; <S%H776><s%> but Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Hoshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> Joshua. <S%H3091><s%>

When Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them to spy <S%H8446><s%> out the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Go <S%H5927><s%> up there <S%H2088><s%> into the Negev; <S%H5045><s%> then go <S%H5927><s%> up into the hill <S%H2022><s%> country. <S%H2022><s%>

"And see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> is like, and whether the people <S%H5971><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> in it are strong <S%H2389><s%> [or <S%H518><s%>] weak, <S%H7504><s%> whether they are few <S%H4592><s%> or many. <S%H7227><s%>

"And how <S%H4100><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> they live, <S%H3427><s%> is it good <S%H2896><s%> or <S%H518><s%> bad <S%H7451><s%>? And how <S%H4100><s%> are the cities <S%H5892><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> <S%H1992><s%> they live, <S%H3427><s%> are [they] like [open] camps <S%H4264><s%> or <S%H518><s%> with fortifications <S%H4013><s%>?

"And how <S%H4100><s%> is the land, <S%H776><s%> is it fat <S%H8082><s%> or <S%H518><s%> lean <S%H7330><s%>? Are there <S%H3426><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> in it or <S%H518><s%> not? Make <S%H2388><s%> an effort <S%H2388><s%> then to get <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>" Now the time <S%H3117><s%> was the time <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H1061><s%> ripe <S%H1061><s%> grapes. <S%H6025><s%>
So they went <S%H5927><s%> up and spied <S%H8446><s%> out the land <S%H776><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Rehob, <S%H7340><s%> at Lebo-hamath.

When they had gone <S%H5927><s%> up into the Negev, <S%H5045><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> to Hebron <S%H2275><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> Ahiman, <S%H289><s%> Sheshai <S%H8344><s%> and Talmai, <S%H8526><s%> the descendants <S%H3211><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%> were. (Now Hebron <S%H2275><s%> was built <S%H1129><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Zoan <S%H6814><s%> in Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>)

Then they came <S%H935><s%> to the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol <S%H812><s%> and from there <S%H8033><s%> cut <S%H3772><s%> down <S%H3772><s%> a branch <S%H2156><s%> with a single <S%H259><s%> cluster <S%H811><s%> of grapes; <S%H6025><s%> and they carried <S%H5375><s%> it on a pole <S%H4132><s%> between two <S%H8147><s%> [men,] with some <S%H4480><s%> of the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> and the figs. <S%H8384><s%>

That place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol, <S%H812><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H182><s%> of the cluster <S%H811><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cut <S%H3772><s%> down <S%H3772><s%> from there. <S%H8033><s%>
When they returned <S%H7725><s%> from spying <S%H8446><s%> out the land, <S%H776><s%> at the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%>

they proceeded <S%H1980><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran, <S%H6290><s%> at Kadesh; <S%H6946><s%> and they brought <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> to them and to all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and showed <S%H7200><s%> them the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

Thus they told <S%H5608><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> "We went <S%H935><s%> in to the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> you sent <S%H7971><s%> us; and it certainly <S%H1571><s%> does flow <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> is its fruit. <S%H6529><s%>

"Nevertheless, <S%H657><s%> <S%H3588><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> are strong, <S%H5794><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> are fortified <S%H1219><s%> [and] very <S%H3966><s%> large; <S%H1419><s%> and moreover, <S%H1571><s%> we saw <S%H7200><s%> the descendants <S%H3211><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

"Amalek <S%H6002><s%> is living <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Negev <S%H5045><s%> and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%> and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> and the Amorites <S%H567><s%> are living <S%H3427><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H2022><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> are living <S%H3427><s%> by the sea <S%H3220><s%> and by the side <S%H3027><s%> of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>"

Then Caleb <S%H3612><s%> quieted <S%H2013><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> before <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "We should by all <S%H5927><s%> means <S%H5927><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up and take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of it, for we shall surely <S%H3201><s%> overcome <S%H3201><s%> it."

But the men <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had gone <S%H5927><s%> up with him said, <S%H559><s%> "We are not able <S%H3201><s%> to go <S%H5927><s%> up against <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> for they are too <S%H4480><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> for us."

So they gave <S%H3318><s%> out to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> a bad <S%H1681><s%> report <S%H1681><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had spied <S%H8446><s%> out, saying, <S%H559><s%> "The land <S%H776><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we have gone, <S%H5674><s%> in spying <S%H8446><s%> it out, is a land <S%H776><s%> that devours <S%H398><s%> its inhabitants; <S%H3427><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> we saw <S%H7200><s%> in it are men <S%H376><s%> of [great] size. <S%H4060><s%>

"There <S%H8033><s%> also we saw <S%H7200><s%> the Nephilim <S%H5303><s%> (the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%> are part of the Nephilim <S%H5303><s%>); and we became <S%H1961><s%> like grasshoppers <S%H2284><s%> in our own sight, <S%H5869><s%> and so <S%H3651><s%> we were in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>"
